tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE abandonded_carts (
    cart_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    products JSON,
    abandoned_date TIMESTAMP,
    follow_up_emails_sent INT
);

CREATE TABLE abandoned_carts (
    cart_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    product_id UUID,
    cart_items JSONB,
    abandoned_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE follow_up_emails (
    email_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    subject VARCHAR(255),
    body TEXT,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE targeted_emails (
	email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	email_status VARCHAR,
	sent_date TIMESTAMP,
	opened BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE abandoned_carts (
    cart_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    products TEXT[],
    abandoned_at TIMESTAMP,
    email_sent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE emails (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(100),
    sent_at TIMESTAMP,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cart_id INT REFERENCES abandoned_carts(cart_id),
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date DATE
)
